玕字的基本解释

玕
gān
〔琅玕〕见“
琅”。

玕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gān］
［《廣韻》古寒切，平寒，見。］
亦作“玵2”。
(1)琅玕的简称。珠树。
(2)琅玕的简称。美石。

玕字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　玕； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页727第20
〔古文〕?【唐韻】古寒切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】居寒切，?音干。【說文】琅玕也。【廣韻】美石，次玉。【書·禹貢】厥貢惟球琳琅玕。【爾雅·釋地】西北之美者，有崑崙虛之璆琳琅玕焉。【註】琅玕，狀如珠也。　又樹名。【韻會】崑崙山有琅玕樹。【本草綱目】流離之類有五色，火劑瑞也。以靑者入藥。　又【韻補】叶經天切，音堅。【曹植·美女篇】攘袖見素手，皓腕約金環。頭上金爵釵，腰佩翠琅玕。環叶音懸。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gān］
["Guangyun" Gu Han cut, Ping Han, see. ]
Also known as "玵2".
(1) The abbreviation of Langgan. Bead tree.
(2) The abbreviation of Langgan. Beautiful stone.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　玕; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 727 No. 20
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Gu Hanqi [Jiyun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zhengyun] Living in the cold and dry. [Said Wen] Langgan Ye. [Guangyun] Beautiful stone, second jade. 【Book·Yugong】Jue Gongweiqiu Lin Langgan. [Erya·Shidi] The beauty of the northwest, there is the Kunlun imaginary 璆璆玕焉. [Note] Langgan is like a pearl.　Also tree name. [Rhyme Club] There are Langgan trees in Kunlun Mountain. [Compendium of Materia Medica] There are five colors of drifting, and fire agent Rui also. Those who take 靑 are used as medicine.　[Rhyme Replenishment] Ye Jingtian cuts the sky, and the sound is strong. [Cao Zhi·Beauty Articles] See the plain hands in the short sleeves, and the golden rings on the bright wrist. Jin Jue hairpin on his head and Cui Langwan on his waist. Ring leaves sound hanging.
